title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync
description: JarExporter causes the application to go out of sync when overwriting an exported jar file in the same directory.
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when the exported jar file is overwritten for the second time.
EB: The application should not display an out of sync message when overwriting an exported jar file in the same directory.
SR:
1. Open a directory (project) to export.
2. Export the directory as a jar file.
3. Place the exported jar file in the same directory.
4. Overwrite the exported jar file.
5. Repeat step 4 for the second time.
